title: List of PostgreSQL server parameters. see https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/runtime-config.html and https://postgresqlco.nf

allow_in_place_tablespaces.title: allow_in_place_tablespaces
allow_in_place_tablespaces.description:
Allows tablespaces directly inside pg_tblspc, for testing.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/allow_in_place_tablespaces/
allow_in_place_tablespaces.markdownDescription:
Allows tablespaces directly inside pg_tblspc, for testing.

see [allow_in_place_tablespaces documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/allow_in_place_tablespaces/)

allow_system_table_mods.title: allow_system_table_mods
allow_system_table_mods.description:
Allows modifications of the structure of system tables.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/allow_system_table_mods/
allow_system_table_mods.markdownDescription:
Allows modifications of the structure of system tables.

see [allow_system_table_mods documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/allow_system_table_mods/)

application_name.title: application_name
application_name.description:
Sets the application name to be reported in statistics and logs.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/application_name/
application_name.markdownDescription:
Sets the application name to be reported in statistics and logs.

see [application_name documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/application_name/)

archive_cleanup_command.title: archive_cleanup_command
archive_cleanup_command.description:
Sets the shell command that will be executed at every restart point.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_cleanup_command/
archive_cleanup_command.markdownDescription:
Sets the shell command that will be executed at every restart point.

see [archive_cleanup_command documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_cleanup_command/)

archive_command.title: archive_command
archive_command.description:
Sets the shell command that will be called to archive a WAL file.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_command/
archive_command.markdownDescription:
Sets the shell command that will be called to archive a WAL file.

see [archive_command documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_command/)

archive_mode.title: archive_mode
archive_mode.description:
Allows archiving of WAL files using archive_command.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_mode/
archive_mode.markdownDescription:
Allows archiving of WAL files using archive_command.

see [archive_mode documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_mode/)

archive_timeout.title: archive_timeout
archive_timeout.description:
Forces a switch to the next WAL file if a new file has not been started within N seconds.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_timeout/
archive_timeout.markdownDescription:
Forces a switch to the next WAL file if a new file has not been started within N seconds.

see [archive_timeout documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/archive_timeout/)

array_nulls.title: array_nulls
array_nulls.description:
Enable input of NULL elements in arrays.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/array_nulls/
array_nulls.markdownDescription:
Enable input of NULL elements in arrays.

see [array_nulls documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/array_nulls/)

authentication_timeout.title: authentication_timeout
authentication_timeout.description:
Sets the maximum allowed time to complete client authentication.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/authentication_timeout/
authentication_timeout.markdownDescription:
Sets the maximum allowed time to complete client authentication.

see [authentication_timeout documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/authentication_timeout/)

autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor.title: autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor
autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor.description:
Number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze as a fraction of reltuples.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor/
autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor.markdownDescription:
Number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze as a fraction of reltuples.

see [autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor/)

autovacuum_analyze_threshold.title: autovacuum_analyze_threshold
autovacuum_analyze_threshold.description:
Minimum number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_analyze_threshold/
autovacuum_analyze_threshold.markdownDescription:
Minimum number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze.

see [autovacuum_analyze_threshold documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_analyze_threshold/)

autovacuum_freeze_max_age.title: autovacuum_freeze_max_age
autovacuum_freeze_max_age.description:
Age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent transaction ID wraparound.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_freeze_max_age/
autovacuum_freeze_max_age.markdownDescription:
Age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent transaction ID wraparound.

see [autovacuum_freeze_max_age documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_freeze_max_age/)

autovacuum_max_workers.title: autovacuum_max_workers
autovacuum_max_workers.description:
Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running autovacuum worker processes.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_max_workers/
autovacuum_max_workers.markdownDescription:
Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running autovacuum worker processes.

see [autovacuum_max_workers documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_max_workers/)

autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age.title: autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age
autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age.description:
Multixact age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent multixact wraparound.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age/
autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age.markdownDescription:
Multixact age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent multixact wraparound.

see [autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age/)

autovacuum_naptime.title: autovacuum_naptime
autovacuum_naptime.description:
Time to sleep between autovacuum runs.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_naptime/
autovacuum_naptime.markdownDescription:
Time to sleep between autovacuum runs.

see [autovacuum_naptime documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_naptime/)

autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay.title: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay
autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay.description:
Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds, for autovacuum.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay/
autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay.markdownDescription:
Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds, for autovacuum.

see [autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay/)

autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit.title: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit
autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit.description:
Vacuum cost amount available before napping, for autovacuum.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit/
autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit.markdownDescription:
Vacuum cost amount available before napping, for autovacuum.

see [autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit/)

autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor.title: autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor
autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor.description:
Number of tuple inserts prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor/
autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor.markdownDescription:
Number of tuple inserts prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

see [autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_insert_scale_factor/)

autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold.title: autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold
autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold.description:
Minimum number of tuple inserts prior to vacuum, or -1 to disable insert vacuums.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold/
autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold.markdownDescription:
Minimum number of tuple inserts prior to vacuum, or -1 to disable insert vacuums.

see [autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_insert_threshold/)

autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor.title: autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor
autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor.description:
Number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor/
autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor.markdownDescription:
Number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

see [autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor/)

autovacuum_vacuum_threshold.title: autovacuum_vacuum_threshold
autovacuum_vacuum_threshold.description:
Minimum number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_threshold/
autovacuum_vacuum_threshold.markdownDescription:
Minimum number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum.

see [autovacuum_vacuum_threshold documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_vacuum_threshold/)

autovacuum_work_mem.title: autovacuum_work_mem
autovacuum_work_mem.description:
Sets the maximum memory to be used by each autovacuum worker process.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_work_mem/
autovacuum_work_mem.markdownDescription:
Sets the maximum memory to be used by each autovacuum worker process.

see [autovacuum_work_mem documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/autovacuum_work_mem/)

backend_flush_after.title: backend_flush_after
backend_flush_after.description:
Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/backend_flush_after/
backend_flush_after.markdownDescription:
Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

see [backend_flush_after documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/backend_flush_after/)

backslash_quote.title: backslash_quote
backslash_quote.description:
Sets whether "'" is allowed in string literals.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/backslash_quote/
backslash_quote.markdownDescription:
Sets whether "'" is allowed in string literals.

see [backslash_quote documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/backslash_quote/)

backtrace_functions.title: backtrace_functions
backtrace_functions.description:
Log backtrace for errors in these functions.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/backtrace_functions/
backtrace_functions.markdownDescription:
Log backtrace for errors in these functions.

see [backtrace_functions documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/backtrace_functions/)

bgwriter_delay.title: bgwriter_delay
bgwriter_delay.description:
Background writer sleep time between rounds.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_delay/
bgwriter_delay.markdownDescription:
Background writer sleep time between rounds.

see [bgwriter_delay documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_delay/)

bgwriter_flush_after.title: bgwriter_flush_after
bgwriter_flush_after.description:
Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_flush_after/
bgwriter_flush_after.markdownDescription:
Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

see [bgwriter_flush_after documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_flush_after/)

bgwriter_lru_maxpages.title: bgwriter_lru_maxpages
bgwriter_lru_maxpages.description:
Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_lru_maxpages/
bgwriter_lru_maxpages.markdownDescription:
Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round.

see [bgwriter_lru_maxpages documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_lru_maxpages/)

bgwriter_lru_multiplier.title: bgwriter_lru_multiplier
bgwriter_lru_multiplier.description:
Multiple of the average buffer usage to free per round.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_lru_multiplier/
bgwriter_lru_multiplier.markdownDescription:
Multiple of the average buffer usage to free per round.

see [bgwriter_lru_multiplier documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bgwriter_lru_multiplier/)

block_size.title: block_size
block_size.description:
Shows the size of a disk block.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/block_size/
block_size.markdownDescription:
Shows the size of a disk block.

see [block_size documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/block_size/)

bonjour.title: bonjour
bonjour.description:
Enables advertising the server via Bonjour.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bonjour/
bonjour.markdownDescription:
Enables advertising the server via Bonjour.

see [bonjour documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bonjour/)

bonjour_name.title: bonjour_name
bonjour_name.description:
Sets the Bonjour service name.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bonjour_name/
bonjour_name.markdownDescription:
Sets the Bonjour service name.

see [bonjour_name documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bonjour_name/)

bytea_output.title: bytea_output
bytea_output.description:
Sets the output format for bytea.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bytea_output/
bytea_output.markdownDescription:
Sets the output format for bytea.

see [bytea_output documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/bytea_output/)

check_function_bodies.title: check_function_bodies
check_function_bodies.description:
Check routine bodies during CREATE FUNCTION and CREATE PROCEDURE.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/check_function_bodies/
check_function_bodies.markdownDescription:
Check routine bodies during CREATE FUNCTION and CREATE PROCEDURE.

see [check_function_bodies documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/check_function_bodies/)

checkpoint_completion_target.title: checkpoint_completion_target
checkpoint_completion_target.description:
Time spent flushing dirty buffers during checkpoint, as fraction of checkpoint interval.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_completion_target/
checkpoint_completion_target.markdownDescription:
Time spent flushing dirty buffers during checkpoint, as fraction of checkpoint interval.

see [checkpoint_completion_target documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_completion_target/)

checkpoint_flush_after.title: checkpoint_flush_after
checkpoint_flush_after.description:
Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_flush_after/
checkpoint_flush_after.markdownDescription:
Number of pages after which previously performed writes are flushed to disk.

see [checkpoint_flush_after documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_flush_after/)

checkpoint_timeout.title: checkpoint_timeout
checkpoint_timeout.description:
Sets the maximum time between automatic WAL checkpoints.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_timeout/
checkpoint_timeout.markdownDescription:
Sets the maximum time between automatic WAL checkpoints.

see [checkpoint_timeout documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_timeout/)

checkpoint_warning.title: checkpoint_warning
checkpoint_warning.description:
Enables warnings if checkpoint segments are filled more frequently than this.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_warning/
checkpoint_warning.markdownDescription:
Enables warnings if checkpoint segments are filled more frequently than this.

see [checkpoint_warning documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/checkpoint_warning/)

client_connection_check_interval.title: client_connection_check_interval
client_connection_check_interval.description:
Sets the time interval between checks for disconnection while running queries.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/client_connection_check_interval/
client_connection_check_interval.markdownDescription:
Sets the time interval between checks for disconnection while running queries.

see [client_connection_check_interval documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/client_connection_check_interval/)

client_encoding.title: client_encoding
client_encoding.description:
Sets the client's character set encoding.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/client_encoding/
client_encoding.markdownDescription:
Sets the client's character set encoding.

see [client_encoding documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/client_encoding/)

client_min_messages.title: client_min_messages
client_min_messages.description:
Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/client_min_messages/
client_min_messages.markdownDescription:
Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.

see [client_min_messages documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/client_min_messages/)

cluster_name.title: cluster_name
cluster_name.description:
Sets the name of the cluster, which is included in the process title.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/cluster_name/
cluster_name.markdownDescription:
Sets the name of the cluster, which is included in the process title.

see [cluster_name documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/cluster_name/)

commit_delay.title: commit_delay
commit_delay.description:
Sets the delay in microseconds between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/commit_delay/
commit_delay.markdownDescription:
Sets the delay in microseconds between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk.

see [commit_delay documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/commit_delay/)

commit_siblings.title: commit_siblings
commit_siblings.description:
Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/commit_siblings/
commit_siblings.markdownDescription:
Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

see [commit_siblings documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/commit_siblings/)

constraint_exclusion.description:
Enables the planner to use constraints to optimize queries.

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/constraint_exclusion/
constraint_exclusion.markdownDescription:
Enables the planner to use constraints to optimize queries.

see [constraint_exclusion documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/constraint_exclusion/)

cpu_index_tuple_cost.title: cpu_index_tuple_cost
cpu_index_tuple_cost.description:

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/cpu_index_tuple_cost/
cpu_index_tuple_cost.markdownDescription:
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each index entry during an index scan.

see [cpu_index_tuple_cost documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/cpu_index_tuple_cost/)

cpu_operator_cost.title: cpu_operator_cost
cpu_operator_cost.description:
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each operator or function call.

cpu_operator_cost.markdownDescription:
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each operator or function call.

see [cpu_operator_cost documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/cpu_operator_cost/)

cpu_tuple_cost.title: cpu_tuple_cost
cpu_tuple_cost.description:
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row).

cpu_tuple_cost.markdownDescription:
Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row).

see [cpu_tuple_cost documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/cpu_tuple_cost/)

cursor_tuple_fraction.description:

cursor_tuple_fraction.markdownDescription:

see [cursor_tuple_fraction documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/cursor_tuple_fraction/)

data_checksums.description:

see https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/data_checksums/
data_checksums.markdownDescription:
Shows whether data checksums are turned on for this cluster.

see [data_checksums documentation](https://postgresqlco.nf/doc/en/param/data_checksums/)

data_directory_mode.title: data_directory_mode
data_directory_mode.description:

data_directory_mode.markdownDescription:
Shows the mode of the data directory.

data_sync_retry.markdownDescription:

DateStyle.markdownDescription:
Sets the display format for date and time values.

deadlock_timeout.markdownDescription:

debug_discard_caches.markdownDescription:

debug_pretty_print.markdownDescription:

debug_print_plan.markdownDescription:

debug_print_rewritten.markdownDescription:
